name: Squeaky Factory
description:
UPDATE: The levels now load properly and the bug with the third level is fixed. Thank you for your patience and comment any other bugs that are found, please!

ESCAPE THE FACTORY!

You're not like other mice - you must know what it's like to feel the fresh air outside, away from the burning chemicals and bustling machines. You must know where cheese comes from! You must escape the factory!!

- This is a work in progress that I'm going to continue working on in the future, for now I just wanted to get a working demo out there!

- Created for the Strawberry Jam Game Jam - Nov. 2020

- Music is Klungo's Arcade by Azureflux, which you can find here!

- Font used is Dogica Pixel by Robert Mocci, which you can find here!

- All other assets were created by yours truly. ;>

- HAVE FUN! >:D

CONTROLS:

- Movement: arrow keys

- Interact/Grab - spacebar

- Note: Crates must be grabbed by holding space and then moved by tapping the arrow keys!
